content: @dennismccain Thanks for this. $FLGT is now my largest holding even though I only didn’t put in a full position. Feels overdone at times but then it keeps going up.  I think their earnings announcement will be huge and spur it higher. Rev grew 350% LY and will go another 200% this year according to seeking alpha, yet trades at 30x which is reasonable at that growth. So while I’ve been tempted to trim I’m not planning to. Those #s frankly make me want to invest more :) Bullish
@howardlindzon that was my take a couple months back. Not huge position but Long $MGM —> just a matter of time before Vegas comes back and upside of online... Bullish

@howardlindzon ❤️ it! $NFLX was back at July levels yet printing $ with great growth & peripheral #s inc reasonable valuation. I’d been accumulating on dips.

Curious/hoping (read: expecting!) other FANGSM et al will post big earnings too. $META $AMZN $AAPL $GOOGL $MSFT & even more excited for $ETSY $SQ $FTCH $MELI etc on ecomm & pmts front. #crush Bullish

Heard of $TGAN - any intell? Symbol didn’t even pop up on stocktwits. Thinly traded OTC but grew rev 600% last year & reasonable multiple 10x (Granted off small rev base), solid margins & ROE. 

Motor part related which is interesting. Popped in August from 5 to 30 (I think 1st listing) then dropped back to 4 & has been there since. Can’t find projections except the 2 analysts who cover it have price targets > +100% ($8+ and trading at $4).
@Frannky Long $AXON too! Is $WRAP possibly the next one or too niche? Bullish

@MryD thanks for that. It was my main fear that bump too covid related and not sustainable. Attached FOOL article suggests it can overcome with core biz improvement but Credit Suisse downgraded it. I sold $QDEL bc of that previously but hope $FLGT different as @blueprism pointed out. 

So net - pausing on $FLGT - keeping position but prob won’t add on dip as I’d wanted. Hopefully massive earnings (seems definite) will raise price then can re-assess projections.

—-
fool.com/investing/2020/12/...

@howardlindzon 👍 I’ve been doing the same - size & industries. A few I’ve found & like recently - 

For climate/energy - hard to pick winners small as capital intensive. Invested in $DQ, Looking @ $EVA.
Good ETFs like $TAN $LIT may be helpful; at least for ideas if not direct investment. 

Biotechs/HC - if you count cannabis then plenty - $TCNNF is a pick from your boy Todd Harrison; if pure drugs/devices it’s much higher risk/reward - took starter position in $NARI $CMPS $SMLR $NNOX; looking at $TBIO & $INMD
My top choice outside cannabis = $FLGT  (healthcare, got more on dip today) 

Other tech names -
$FUTU (tech, robinhood comp)
$ATER (ecomm, maybe too small for you) Bullish

$FLGT Best overall #s on any stock I’ve screened in a while. Fwd rev growth 158% (! & on $135m so not tiny) while only trading at 11 EV/S. Plus strong margins & ROE etc... & even profitable w 31PE. In at 48 & 56 over last couple weeks; now at 72. 

Am I missing something? Feels like a back up the truck moment even with the run up (def if settles). Bullish

@howardlindzon I would have guessed $ZM given growth (and $AMZN probably done hiring for holidays), but I’m going with $TWLO as my highest conviction bigger name. 

Btw, nice touch on the bottom ad for the podcast :)

@GaryStrolling would you mind explaining why/how $SPG will go up from here? I’m used to growth stocks but am now trying to find dividend stocks for my parents so they can get out of bonds #ugh. $SPG has a lot of things I’d look for - great Profit margin, ROE, $/Employee, analysts’ price target >+10%, plus a strong dividend, *BUT* Rev is projected to decline (usually most important to me), earnings projected to decline, & their div payout ratio looks >100% (I’dthink a red flag). The last 3 suggest the dividend will drop and combined with tomorrow’s ex-Div date, the price probably will drop too, no? Thanks for any help!

@mitr would you mind explaining why/how $SPG will go from $83 to $120? I’m used to growth stocks but am now trying to find dividend stocks for my parents so they can get out of bonds #ugh. $SPG has a lot of things I’d look for - great Profit margin, ROE, $/Employee, analysts’ price target >+10%, plus a strong dividend, *BUT* Rev is projected to decline (usually most important to me), earnings projected to decline, & their div payout ratio looks >100% (I’dthink a red flag). The last 3 suggest the dividend will drop and the price probably will too, no? Thanks for any help!

@howardlindzon I am long (small position) in $SHOP and wanted to add more but didn’t. *How do you get past the >50x P/S with Rev growth projections +50% next year (I look for <1:2 ratio)?* Ok ratio but suggests limited upside, no? Esp when $AMZN could do, $BIGC coming up, & lots of other stocks with more growth & lower PS.
@Breakoutstockmoves what’s the difference between $RSI $GENI ?? Thanks.
$AFRM what does Number 810 mean? Thanks.
$AFRM what does number 800 mean?
@buttonwood10 @Linusleblanc sizable long $LITE 👍

@howardlindzon <$10 stock finds = risky but fun. Have you looked at $ZIXI (my top <$10; banker just sent me an email using Zix’s cyber tech!)? $SIRI (think you still like $SPOT)? $ET or $FRO if you want a cyclical/energy? Looking at $NTZ now for value.  Couple cannabis plays but can’t trade all… $CRLBF $TRSSF et al (top choice there = $TCNNF but > $30 now). Bullish

@howardlindzon I’m long (small position) $DKNG but how much can we trust “upbeat” given snacks daily’s points about CEOs knowing how to manage these calls. Go to 1:25 of this podcast re keywords to beat algos. open.spotify.com/episode/6a...
@howardlindzon time to do the same by buying $FVRR & $ETSY (directly related to $UPWK) & perhaps $JMIA $BABA $FROG as they dropped a bit much? Covid not going away that fast. Bullish

@howardlindzon I hear you. Same 🤦‍♂️ on $TTD but it’s rev growth 21% (even if use Fwd = 28.5) & trading at 44 EV/Sales. So many stocks w/ that ratio (1:2) flipped (& even better like 4:1) that this has always seemed overvalued vs growth stocks. We need to have *some* discipline. Whenever we chase it *can* & often does (eventually) drop... See —> $FSLY

@howardlindzon Yes! Doubled down on $ESTC a couple days ago - luck but seemed undervalued: RevGrowth / P/S ratio. 

Separately, loved your podcast w/ Michael/Cohesity ‘Batting avg def higher for b2b w/ more power’. Long $CRWD $NOW & general cybersecurity - potential sleeper gem $ZIXI (better value alt to $PANW) - know that one? Bullish

@howardlindzon Like the idea of finding the China version of X (Eg, v long $BABA, also long $MELI, $ADYEY etc). But rev growth at $IQ seems low for that kind of company, no? Didn’t spend much time on though
@howardlindzon $TUP ^~4x earnings due to turnaround plan. Note rev only up 14%. fool.com/investing/2020/10/...
